original_body_lines: Local artistes are certainly in great demand, Down Under, as well.
Sohan Weerasinghe will be there to usher in the New Year, 2024, in Melbourne, along with Corrine and Clifford Richards.

However, before we get to the month of December, I’m told that Bathiya & Santhush, along with Umaria and Randhir, and the band 2Forty2, will be seen in action, on 8th July, at the Concourse Concert Hall, in Sydney, Australia.
And, this Saturday, 3rd June, Misty will be the band to provide the music at the Servicemen Association of Queensland Dinner Dance, in Brisbane.
They will also be doing the Jet Travel & Cruise Exclusive Gala Dinner Dance, on Saturday, 10th June, in Melbourne, with guest artistes Radika and Esric Jackson.
Singer Corrine Almeida will be featured at the dinner dance, ‘Christmas in July’, presented by the Sydney Bens, on 22nd July, in Sydney
